name: Valar, Vaalmonican Hallow Hymn
text:
2 monsters, including a "Vaalmonica" Link Monster
Unaffected by non-"Vaalmonica" cards' effects while 6 or more Resonance Counters are on your field. This card gains 1 additional attack each Battle Phase for each Level 4 "Vaalmonica" monster you control. Once per turn, when your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can negate the Summon, and if you do, destroy that monster(s), then remove 3 Resonance Counters from your field.
